Package org.smpp.smscsim

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PDUProcessorFactory
    Descandants of this class are passed to SMSCListener for generating instancies of classes derived from PDUProcessor.
    SMSCListener
    Please enter a description of this class here
    SMSCSession
    Please enter a description of this class here
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeliveryInfoSender
    Class DeliveryInfoSender ...
    PDUProcessor
    PDUProcessor is abstract class which defines interface functions for processing PDUs received by SMSCSession from client as well as functions for the server side sending of PDU.
    PDUProcessorGroup
    Simple container to hold set of somehow related processors.
    ShortMessageStore
    Class ShortMessageStore is used to store the sms's sent by a client to the smsc.
    Simulator
    Class Simulator is an application class behaving as a real SMSC with SMPP interface.
    SimulatorPDUProcessor
    Class SimulatorPDUProcessor gets the Request from the client and creates the proper Response and sends it.
    SimulatorPDUProcessorFactory
    Class SimulatorPDUProcessorFactory creates new instances of a SimulatorPDUProcessor.
    SMSCListenerImpl
    This class accepts client connection on given port.
    SMSCSessionImpl
    This class represent one client connection to the server starting by accepting the connection, authenticating of the client, communication and finished by unbinding.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ShortMessageStoreException
